name: Tile Tap Puzzle
description:
• Challenge yourself to complete all 18 levels!
  • Use the Mouse to click on tiles, every tile you click will switch colors until it eventually breaks and sends off a wave in every direction
  • The wave can also break tiles!
  • Clear all tiles to advance to the next level

This game was created at the AfterFour summer camp program by one of the campers, with an aesthetic update from BluishGreenPro. Please be polite and encourage his game-making efforts in the comments!

For more Tile Tapping Action, check out: Pixel Puzzle: Tile Tap by Bluish-Green Productions
